main event: A witness reported seeing a round, silvery-white object with smoke rising around it over Miami, Florida on 06/15/52.
interesting points: The object was observed for about 20 seconds and gained altitude during its flight.,The object was approximately the size of a basketball and appeared to emit sparks.,The conclusion of the investigation was that it was probably a balloon.,The witness described the object as having a flat bottom and a round top.,The object was moving at an estimated speed of 700 to 800 miles per hour.
